definition: to transfer (for a specific purpose)/to allocate/(computing) to invoke (a command, an application etc)
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Your application instantiates the stub class and calls its methods locally.
sentences.chinese: 應用程序實例化存根類並在本地調用它的方法。

sentences.english: Working with the right queue is the task of the adapter configuration, as detailed above.
sentences.chinese: 調用正確的隊列是適配器配置的工作，如上文中所述。

sentences.english: This sequence of function calls shows you the path to the crash.
sentences.chinese: 這個函數調用序列顯示了造成崩潰的代碼路徑。

sentences.english: The following figures summarise the different models that can be invoked .
sentences.chinese: 下圖總結了可調用的不同模型。

sentences.english: Contains settings to manage Remote Procedure Call troubleshooting .
sentences.chinese: 包含管理遠程過程調用疑難解答的設置。

sentences.english: Why invoke a user-space application from the kernel?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼要從內核調用用戶空間應用程序？
我們之前看到過函數調用。

sentences.english: This method will be called as part of the initialization.
sentences.chinese: 該方法將作爲初始化的一部分被調用。

sentences.english: Invokes a method of a prototype-based object, passing in the specified arguments.
sentences.chinese: 調用基於原型的對象的方法，在指定的參數中傳遞。

sentences.english: Another dimension to consider is how variable the service invocation is.
sentences.chinese: 要考慮的另一方面是調用服務的變數。

sentences.english: After the boot countdown, the system automatically invokes the boot script.
sentences.chinese: 引導開始倒計時時，系統自動調用引導腳本。

sentences.english: When a function calls itself in a tail-call, the method is even easier.
sentences.chinese: 當函數在尾部調用中調用自己時，方法更爲簡單。

sentences.english: When a function calls itself in a tail-call, the method is even easier.
sentences.chinese: 當函數在尾部調用中調用自己時，方法更爲簡單。

sentences.english: It can be called iteratively in a server thread.
sentences.chinese: 在服務器線程中可以迭代地調用它。
